Solution.value: Check the notification host server configuration

Diagnosis.value: Attempted to cast an object to a subclass of which it is not an instance.

Solution.value: Check the string of the class name that the system is trying to load.

Reason.value: Error while parsing a date string.

Diagnosis.value: Attempted to convert a string to a Date object, but that the string does not have the specified format.

Solution.value: Check the specified format in the source code against what was entered.

Diagnosis.value: Likely that the event class does not exist or the lookup is searching with the wrong key.
Attempted to convert a string to one of the numeric types, but that the string does not have the appropriate format.

Solution.value: Check the string of the value that the system is trying to parse.

Reason.value: Tried to load in a class through its string name but no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.

Diagnosis.value: Tried to load class through string name using one of the following: 1) The forName method in class Class. 2) The findSystemClass method in class ClassLoader. 3) The loadClass method in class ClassLoader.

Solution.value: Check the string of the class name that the system is trying to load.

Reason.value: Attempted to use an object that had a 'null' value.

Diagnosis.value: One of the following has occurred: 1) Calling the instance method of a null object. 2) Accessing or modifying the field of a null object. 3) Taking the length of null as if it were an array. 4) Accessing or modifying the slots of null as if it were an array. 5) Throwing null as if it were a Throwable value.

Solution.value: 1) Identify object with a null value. 2) Check for null value before invoking method. OR Identify why value is getting set to null.

Diagnosis.value: Contract for class require that each @invariant tag is met.

Solution.value: Fix class to ensure a check for valid class state before executing any methods. View call stack to determine location.

Reason.value: Method parameters have invalid states prior to execution of method.

Diagnosis.value: Contract for methods require that each @pre tag is met.

Solution.value: Fix method to ensure a check for valid parameter state before executing any methods. View call stack to determine location.

Diagnosis.value: Resource adapter was unable to establish a connection.

Reason.value: Method parameters/return has invalid state(s) after execution of method.

Diagnosis.value: Contract for methods require that each @post tag is met.

Solution.value: Fix method to ensure a check for valid parameter or return state post executing any methods. View call stack to determine location.
1) Check network transport to database. 2) Check database instance still running.

Reason.value: Problem with the M204 Connection or Program Execution.

Diagnosis.value: Make sure the subsystem is up and the 204 program runs with the data provided.

Solution.value: Fix method to ensure a check for valid parameter. View call stack to determine location.

Reason.value: Problem with the VSAM Connection or Program Execution.

Diagnosis.value: Make sure CicsTransactionGateway and CICS are up.

Solution.value: Fix method to ensure a check for valid parameter. View call stack to determine location.

Reason.value: Problem with the JDBC Connection or Program Execution.

Diagnosis.value: Contact JIMS2 Data Group to make sure DB2 is Available and SQL or Stored Procedure is Valid.

Solution.value: Fix method to ensure a check for valid parameter. View call stack to determine location.
